DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim study : To provide accurate reliable information regard NSCLC clinical management across Central Eastern European country Russia order detect unmet medical need disease term : - Patient hospital characteristic . - Diagnostic treatment approach : initial subsequent . - Follow-up pattern clinical management . - Outcomes : symptom , death , functionality , quality life . - Use resource burden patient health care system . Addendum objective collect epidemiological data EGFR mutation status ( M+ , M- ) Russian population
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiological Study Describe Non Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) Clinical Management Patterns Central Eastern Europe Russia ( Lung-EPICLIN )
DOC.criteria: Confirmed NSCLC diagnosis ( e.g.bronchoscopic biopsy FNAB ) , stage , men woman , attend responsible department treat type patient first time January 1st , 2010 March 31st , 2010 For Patient Reported Outcome ( PRO ) subsample : ability read write since ask participate PRO part study . Selection base disease stage patient , order avoid selection bias . Tumour tissue sample ( paraffinembedded block ) suitable EGFR mutation test available . Mixed histology small cell nonsmall cell lung cancer .
